an5.6:4.1: “Mendicants, you don’t become unwholesome as long as faith is established in wholesome qualities.
an5.6:4.2: But when faith vanishes and faithlessness takes over,
an5.6:5.1: You don’t become unwholesome as long as conscience … fear of consequences … energy … wisdom is established in wholesome qualities.
an5.6:8.2: But when wisdom vanishes and witlessness takes over,
